long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FREE! 

'Free Kobo Books' brings you free Kobo books. 

'Free Kobo Books' gives you - 

1) Free Books that are carefully hand-picked by our curators. 

2) The best free kobo books - we hand pick the ones with the best reviews. 

3) Filter by genre. Want only Romance Free Kobo Books? Only Romance & Mystery? The App lets you choose only the genres you want. 

Get it Now! 

Please Note: Prices change all the time. PLEASE check the prices at the Kobo website before buying. 

Please Note: This is NOT a free kobo book search engine. 

Please Note: Kobo, kobobooks.com and related words, domain names and logos are trade-marks and the property of Kobo Inc. They are only used to illustrate what the app is about i.e. free kobo books. 

Please let us know if you have suggestions.
